message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7200. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $9500 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $8800. It's a fair price considering the quality and uniqueness of the item. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $8800 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand that $8800 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $8200. It's a good price for a high-quality item like this, and I think you'll be happy with the deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $8200 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7800. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I can offer you the product for $8000. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $8000, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7900. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
